metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0182 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In exif_entry_get_value of exif-entry.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-147140917

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-0182` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-1ubuntu1+esm5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libexif package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-1ubuntu1+esm5').
